Project

Class PathPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project.PathPlanner

  • public class PathPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class decides the robot's next waypoint based on obstacles and odometry data
    Version:
    2.0, 25 Nov 2015 Path planning class with obstacle avoidance capability
    Author:
    DPM TEAM18
